verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلصَّٰٓفَّٰتِ صَفًّا
verses.translation_en: By those [angels] lined up in rows
verses.translation_zh: . 以列班者发誓，

verses.translation_en: And those who drive [the clouds]
verses.translation_zh: 以驱策者发誓，

verses.translation_en: And those who recite the message,
verses.translation_zh: 以诵读教诲者发誓，

verses.translation_en: Indeed, your God is One,
verses.translation_zh: 你们所当崇拜者，确是独一的，

verses.text: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَٰرِقِ
verses.translation_en: Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them and Lord of the sunrises.
verses.translation_zh: 他是天地万物之主，是一切东方的主。

verses.text: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.translation_en: Indeed, We have adorned the nearest heaven with an adornment of stars
verses.translation_zh: 我确已用文采即繁星点缀最近的天，

verses.translation_en: And as protection against every rebellious devil
verses.translation_zh: 我对一切叛逆的恶魔保护它，

verses.text: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.translation_en: [So] they may not listen to the exalted assembly [of angels] and are pelted from every side,
verses.translation_zh: 他们不得窃听上界的众天神，他们自各方被射击，

verses.translation_en: Repelled; and for them is a constant punishment,
verses.translation_zh: 被驱逐，他们将受永久的刑罚。

verses.text: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.translation_en: Except one who snatches [some words] by theft, but they are pursued by a burning flame, piercing [in brightness].
verses.translation_zh: 但窃听一次的，灿烂的流星就追赶上他。

verses.text: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ
verses.translation_en: Then inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Are they a stronger [or more difficult] creation or those [others] We have created?" Indeed, We created men from sticky clay.
verses.translation_zh: 你问他们吧！究竟是他们更难造呢？还是我所创造的更难造呢？我确已用粘泥创造了他们。

verses.translation_en: But you wonder, while they mock,
verses.translation_zh: 不然！你感到惊奇，而他们却嘲笑你。

verses.translation_en: And when they are reminded, they remember not.
verses.translation_zh: 他们虽闻教诲，却不觉悟。

verses.translation_en: And when they see a sign, they ridicule
verses.translation_zh: 他们虽见迹象，却加以嘲笑。

verses.text: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation_en: And say, "This is not but obvious magic.
verses.translation_zh: 他们说：这个只是明显的魔术。

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation_en: When we have died and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
verses.translation_zh: 难道我们死后，已变为尘土和朽骨的时候，必定复活吗？

verses.translation_en: And our forefathers [as well]?"
verses.translation_zh: 连我们的祖先，也要复活吗？

verses.translation_en: Say, "Yes, and you will be [rendered] contemptible."
verses.translation_zh: 你说：是的！你们都要卑贱的复活。

verses.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation_en: It will be only one shout, and at once they will be observing.
verses.translation_zh: 才听见一声呐喊，他们就瞻望着，

verses.translation_en: They will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Recompense."
verses.translation_zh: . 他们说：伤哉我们！这就是报应之日。

verses.text: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation_en: [They will be told], "This is the Day of Judgement which you used to deny."
verses.translation_zh: . 这就是你们所否认的判决之日。

verses.text: ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation_en: [The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship
verses.translation_zh: 你们应当集合不义者和他们的伴侣，以及他们舍真主而崇拜的，

verses.text: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation_en: Other than Allah, and guide them to the path of Hellfire
verses.translation_zh: 然后指示他们火狱的道路，

verses.translation_en: And stop them; indeed, they are to be questioned."
verses.translation_zh: 并拦住他们，因为他们的确要受审问。

verses.translation_en: [They will be asked], "What is [wrong] with you? Why do you not help each other?"
verses.translation_zh: 你们怎么不互助呢？

verses.translation_en: But they, that Day, are in surrender.
verses.translation_zh: 不然！他们在今日是归顺的。

verses.translation_en: And they will approach one another blaming each other.
verses.translation_zh: 于是他们大家走向前来，互相谈论，

verses.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.translation_en: They will say, "Indeed, you used to come at us from the right."
verses.translation_zh: 这些人说：你们确已用权力胁迫我们。

verses.translation_en: The oppressors will say, "Rather, you [yourselves] were not believers,
verses.translation_zh: 那些人说：不然！你们自己原来不是信道者，

verses.text: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَٰنٍۭ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَٰغِينَ
verses.translation_en: And we had over you no authority, but you were a transgressing people.
verses.translation_zh: 我们对你们绝无权力。不然！你们是悖逆的民众。

verses.text: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
verses.translation_en: So the word of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].
verses.translation_zh: 故我们应当受我们的主的判决，我们确是尝试的。

verses.translation_en: And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."
verses.translation_zh: 所以我们使你们迷误，我们自己也确是迷误的。

verses.translation_en: So indeed they, that Day, will be sharing in the punishment.
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，他们必定同受刑罚。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, that is how We deal with the criminals.
verses.translation_zh: 我必定这样对待犯罪者。

verses.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.translation_en: Indeed they, when it was said to them, "There is no deity but Allah," were arrogant
verses.translation_zh: 他们确是这样的：有人对他们说：除真主外，绝无应受崇拜的，他们就妄自尊大，

verses.text: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ
verses.translation_en: And were saying, "Are we to leave our gods for a mad poet?"
verses.translation_zh: 并且说：难道我们务必要为一个狂妄的诗人，而抛弃我们的众神灵吗？

verses.translation_en: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.
verses.translation_zh: 不然！他昭示了真理，并证实了历代的使者。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, you [disbelievers] will be tasters of the painful punishment,
verses.translation_zh: 你们必定尝试痛苦的刑罚，

verses.text: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation_en: And you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do -
verses.translation_zh: 你们只依自己的行为而受报酬。

verses.translation_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
verses.translation_zh: 惟真主的虔诚的众仆，

verses.translation_en: Those will have a provision determined -
verses.translation_zh: 将享受一种可知的给养--

verses.translation_en: Fruits; and they will be honored
verses.translation_zh: 各种水果，同时他们是受优待的；

verses.translation_en: In gardens of pleasure
verses.translation_zh: 他们在恩泽的乐园中，

verses.translation_en: On thrones facing one another.
verses.translation_zh: 他们坐在床上，彼此相对；

verses.translation_en: There will be circulated among them a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring,
verses.translation_zh: 有人以杯子在他们之间挨次传递，杯中满盛醴泉，

verses.translation_en: White and delicious to the drinkers;
verses.translation_zh: 颜色洁白，饮者无不称为美味；

verses.text: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.translation_en: No bad effect is there in it, nor from it will they be intoxicated.
verses.translation_zh: 醴泉中无麻醉物，他们也不因它而酩酊；

verses.translation_en: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances, with large, [beautiful] eyes,
verses.translation_zh: 他们将有不视非礼的、美目的伴侣，

verses.translation_en: As if they were [delicate] eggs, well-protected.
verses.translation_zh: 她们仿佛被珍藏的鸵卵样；

verses.translation_en: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
verses.translation_zh: 于是他们走向前来，互相谈论。

verses.text: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ
verses.translation_en: A speaker among them will say, "Indeed, I had a companion [on earth]
verses.translation_zh: 他们中有一个人说：我有一个朋友，

verses.translation_en: Who would say, 'Are you indeed of those who believe
verses.translation_zh: 他问我：'你确是诚信的吗？

verses.text: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.translation_en: That when we have died and become dust and bones, we will indeed be recompensed?'"
verses.translation_zh: 难道我们死后，已变为尘土和朽骨的时候，还必定要受报酬吗？'

verses.translation_en: He will say, "Would you [care to] look?"
verses.translation_zh: 他说：你们愿看他吗？

verses.translation_en: And he will look and see him in the midst of the Hellfire.
verses.translation_zh: 他俯视下面，就看见他在火狱的中央，

verses.translation_en: He will say, "By Allah, you almost ruined me.
verses.translation_zh: 他说：以真主发誓，你的确几乎陷害了我。

verses.text: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.translation_en: If not for the favor of my Lord, I would have been of those brought in [to Hell].
verses.translation_zh: 如果没有我的主的恩惠，我必在被拘禁者之列。

verses.translation_en: Then, are we not to die
verses.translation_zh: 我们不是再死的吗？

verses.text: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation_en: Except for our first death, and we will not be punished?"
verses.translation_zh: 唯有我们初次的死亡，而我们绝不会受惩罚吗？

verses.translation_en: Indeed, this is the great attainment.
verses.translation_zh: 这确是伟大的成功，

verses.translation_en: For the like of this let the workers [on earth] work.
verses.translation_zh: 工作者应当为获得这样的成功而工作。

verses.text: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation_en: Is Paradise a better accommodation or the tree of zaqqum?
verses.translation_zh: 那是更善的款待呢？还是攒楛树？

verses.translation_en: Indeed, We have made it a torment for the wrongdoers.
verses.translation_zh: 我以它为不义者的折磨。

verses.text: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation_en: Indeed, it is a tree issuing from the bottom of the Hellfire,
verses.translation_zh: 它是火狱底生长的棵树，

verses.translation_en: Its emerging fruit as if it was heads of the devils.
verses.translation_zh: 它的花篦，仿佛魔头。

verses.text: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَءَاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ
verses.translation_en: And indeed, they will eat from it and fill with it their bellies.
verses.translation_zh: 他们必定要吃那些果实，而以它充实肚腹。

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation_en: Then indeed, they will have after it a mixture of scalding water.
verses.translation_zh: 然后他们必定要在那些果实上加饮沸水的混汤，

verses.translation_en: Then indeed, their return will be to the Hellfire.
verses.translation_zh: 然后他们必定要归于火狱。

verses.translation_en: Indeed they found their fathers astray.
verses.translation_zh: 他们必定会发现他们的祖先是迷误的，

verses.translation_en: So they hastened [to follow] in their footsteps.
verses.translation_zh: 他们却依着他们踪迹而奔驰。

verses.translation_en: And there had already strayed before them most of the former peoples,
verses.translation_zh: 在他们之前，大半的古人确已迷误了。

verses.translation_en: And We had already sent among them warners.
verses.translation_zh: 我在他们之间，确已派遣过许多警告者。

verses.translation_en: Then look how was the end of those who were warned -
verses.translation_zh: 你看！被警告者的结局是怎样的？

verses.translation_en: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
verses.translation_zh: 除非真主的纯洁的仆人们。

verses.translation_en: And Noah had certainly called Us, and [We are] the best of responders.
verses.translation_zh: 努哈确已向我祈祷，我是最善于应答的！

verses.translation_en: And We saved him and his family from the great affliction.
verses.translation_zh: 我拯救他和他的信徒们脱离大难。

verses.translation_en: And We made his descendants those remaining [on the earth]
verses.translation_zh: 我只使他的子孙得以生存。

verses.translation_en: And left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.translation_zh: 我使他的令名，永存于后代。

verses.translation_en: "Peace upon Noah among the worlds."
verses.translation_zh: 在各民族中，都有人说：祝努哈平安！

verses.translation_en: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.translation_zh: 我必定要这样报酬行善者们。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
verses.translation_zh: 他确是我的信道的仆人。

verses.translation_en: Then We drowned the disbelievers.
verses.translation_zh: 然后，我使别的人淹死。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, among his kind was Abraham,
verses.translation_zh: 他的宗派中，确有易卜拉欣。

verses.translation_en: When he came to his Lord with a sound heart
verses.translation_zh: 当时，他带着健全的心灵，来见他的主。

verses.text: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation_en: [And] when he said to his father and his people, "What do you worship?
verses.translation_zh: 当时，他对他的父亲和宗族说：你们崇拜什么？

verses.translation_en: Is it falsehood [as] gods other than Allah you desire?
verses.translation_zh: 难道你们欲舍真主而悖谬地崇拜许多神灵吗？

verses.translation_en: Then what is your thought about the Lord of the worlds?"
verses.translation_zh: 你们对全世界的主，究竟作什么猜测？

verses.translation_en: And he cast a look at the stars
verses.translation_zh: 他看一看星宿，

verses.translation_en: And said, "Indeed, I am [about to be] ill."
verses.translation_zh: 然后说：我势必要害病。

verses.translation_en: So they turned away from him, departing.
verses.translation_zh: 他们就背离了他，

verses.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation_en: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
verses.translation_zh: 他就悄悄地走向他们的众神灵，他说：你们怎么不吃东西呢？

verses.translation_en: What is [wrong] with you that you do not speak?"
verses.translation_zh: 你们怎么不说话呢？

verses.translation_en: And he turned upon them a blow with [his] right hand.
verses.translation_zh: 他就悄悄以右手打击他们。

verses.translation_en: Then the people came toward him, hastening.
verses.translation_zh: 众人就急急忙忙地来看他，

verses.translation_en: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,
verses.translation_zh: 他说：你们崇拜自己所雕刻的偶像吗？

verses.translation_en: While Allah created you and that which you do?"
verses.translation_zh: 真主创造你们，和你们的行为。

verses.text: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation_en: They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."
verses.translation_zh: 他们说：你们应当为他而修一个火炉，然后，将他投在烈火中。

verses.translation_en: And they intended for him a plan, but We made them the most debased.
verses.translation_zh: 他们欲谋害他，而我却使他们变成占下风的。

verses.text: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation_en: And [then] he said, "Indeed, I will go to [where I am ordered by] my Lord; He will guide me.
verses.translation_zh: 他说：我果然要迁移到我的主所启示我的地方去，他将指导我。

verses.translation_en: My Lord, grant me [a child] from among the righteous."
verses.translation_zh: 我的主呀！求你赏赐我一个善良的儿子。

verses.translation_en: So We gave him good tidings of a forbearing boy.
verses.translation_zh: 我就以一个宽厚的儿童向他报喜。

verses.text: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ قَالَ يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
verses.translation_en: And when he reached with him [the age of] exertion, he said, "O my son, indeed I have seen in a dream that I [must] sacrifice you, so see what you think." He said, "O my father, do as you are commanded. You will find me, if Allah wills, of the steadfast."
verses.translation_zh: 当他长到能帮着他操作的时候，他说：我的小子啊！我确已梦见我宰你为牺牲。你考虑一下！你究竟是什么意见？他说：我的父亲啊！请你执行你所奉的命令吧！如果真主意欲，你将发现我是坚忍的。

verses.translation_en: And when they had both submitted and he put him down upon his forehead,
verses.translation_zh: 他们俩既已顺服真主，而他使他的儿子侧卧着。

verses.translation_en: We called to him, "O Abraham,
verses.translation_zh: 我喊叫说：易卜拉欣啊！

verses.text: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation_en: You have fulfilled the vision." Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.translation_zh: 你确已证实那个梦了。我必定要这样报酬行善的人们。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, this was the clear trial.
verses.translation_zh: . 这确是明显的考验。

verses.translation_en: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,
verses.translation_zh: 我以一个伟大的牺牲赎了他。

verses.translation_en: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.translation_zh: 我使他的令名，永存于后代。

verses.translation_en: "Peace upon Abraham."
verses.translation_zh: 祝易卜拉欣平安！

verses.translation_en: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.translation_zh: 我要这样报酬行善者。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
verses.translation_zh: 他确是我的信道的仆人，

verses.translation_en: And We gave him good tidings of Isaac, a prophet from among the righteous.
verses.translation_zh: 我以将为先知和善人的易司哈格向他报喜。

verses.text: وَبَٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَٰقَ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌ
verses.translation_en: And We blessed him and Isaac. But among their descendants is the doer of good and the clearly unjust to himself.
verses.translation_zh: 我降福于他和易司哈格。他们俩的子孙中，将有行善者和公然自暴自弃者。

verses.translation_en: And We did certainly confer favor upon Moses and Aaron.
verses.translation_zh: 我确已施恩于穆萨和哈伦。

verses.translation_en: And We saved them and their people from the great affliction,
verses.translation_zh: 我曾使他们俩及其宗族，得免于大难。

verses.translation_en: And We supported them so it was they who overcame.
verses.translation_zh: 我曾援助他们，所以他们是胜利者。

verses.translation_en: And We gave them the explicit Scripture,
verses.translation_zh: 我授予他们俩详明的经典，

verses.translation_en: And We guided them on the straight path.
verses.translation_zh: 我指引他们俩正直的道路，

verses.translation_en: And We left for them [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.translation_zh: 我使他们俩的令名，永存于后代。

verses.translation_en: "Peace upon Moses and Aaron."
verses.translation_zh: 祝穆萨和哈伦平安！

verses.translation_en: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.translation_zh: 我必定要这样报酬行善者。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.
verses.translation_zh: 他们俩确是我的信道的仆人。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,
verses.translation_zh: 易勒雅斯确是使者。

verses.translation_en: When he said to his people, "Will you not fear Allah?
verses.translation_zh: 当时，他对他的宗族说：难道你们不敬畏真主吗？

verses.translation_en: Do you call upon Ba'l and leave the best of creators -
verses.translation_zh: 难道你们祈祷白耳利，而舍弃最优越的创造者--

verses.translation_en: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers?"
verses.translation_zh: 真主，你们的主，你们祖先的主吗？

verses.translation_en: And they denied him, so indeed, they will be brought [for punishment],
verses.translation_zh: 他们否认他，所以他们必定要被拘禁。

verses.translation_en: Except the chosen servants of Allah.
verses.translation_zh: 惟真主的纯洁的众仆则不然。

verses.translation_en: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
verses.translation_zh: 我使他的令名，永存于后代。

verses.translation_en: "Peace upon Elias."
verses.translation_zh: 祝易勒雅斯平安！

verses.translation_en: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
verses.translation_zh: 我必定要这样报酬行善者。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
verses.translation_zh: 他确是我的信道的仆人。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.
verses.translation_zh: 鲁特确是使者。

verses.translation_en: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
verses.translation_zh: 当时，我拯救了他，和他的全体信徒；

verses.translation_en: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].
verses.translation_zh: 惟有一个老妇人和其余的人，没有获得拯救。

verses.translation_en: Then We destroyed the others.
verses.translation_zh: 然后，我毁灭了别的许多人。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning
verses.translation_zh: 你们的确朝夕经过他们的遗迹，

verses.translation_en: And at night. Then will you not use reason?
verses.translation_zh: 难道你们不了解吗？

verses.translation_en: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.
verses.translation_zh: 优努司确是使者。

verses.translation_en: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.
verses.translation_zh: 当时，他逃到那只满载的船舶上。

verses.translation_en: And he drew lots and was among the losers.
verses.translation_zh: 他就拈阄，他却是失败的，

verses.translation_en: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
verses.translation_zh: 大鱼就吞了他，同时，他是应受谴责的。

verses.translation_en: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,
verses.translation_zh: 假若不是常赞颂真主者，

verses.text: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation_en: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.
verses.translation_zh: 他必葬身鱼腹，直到世人复活之日。

verses.translation_en: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.
verses.translation_zh: 然后，我将他抛在旱地上，当时他是有病的。

verses.translation_en: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.
verses.translation_zh: 我使一棵瓠瓜，长起来遮着他。

verses.text: وَأَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.translation_en: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
verses.translation_zh: 我曾派遣他去教化十多万民众。

verses.translation_en: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.
verses.translation_zh: 他们便归信他，我使他们享乐至一定期。

verses.translation_en: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?
verses.translation_zh: 你问他们吧！你的主有许多女儿，他们却有多少儿子呢？

verses.text: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثًا وَهُمْ شَٰهِدُونَ
verses.translation_en: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"
verses.translation_zh: 还是我曾将众天神造成女性的，他们曾眼见我的创造呢？

verses.translation_en: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
verses.translation_zh: 真的，他们因为自己的悖谬，必定要说：

verses.translation_en: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
verses.translation_zh: 真主已生育了。他们确是说谎者。

verses.translation_en: Has He chosen daughters over sons?
verses.translation_zh: 难道他不要儿子，却要女儿吗？

verses.translation_en: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
verses.translation_zh: 你们有什么理由？你们怎么这样判断呢？

verses.translation_en: Then will you not be reminded?
verses.translation_zh: 你们还不觉悟吗？

verses.translation_en: Or do you have a clear authority?
verses.translation_zh: 难道你们有一个明证吗？

verses.translation_en: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
verses.translation_zh: 拿出你们的经典来吧，倘若你们是诚实的！

verses.text: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation_en: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
verses.translation_zh: 他们妄言他与精灵之间，有姻亲关系。精灵确已知道他们将被拘禁

verses.translation_en: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
verses.translation_zh: --超绝哉真主！他是超乎他们的叙述的，

verses.translation_en: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].
verses.translation_zh: --惟真主的纯洁的众仆，不被拘禁。

verses.translation_en: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
verses.translation_zh: 你们和你们所崇拜的，

verses.translation_en: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
verses.translation_zh: 绝不能把任何人引诱去崇拜他们，

verses.translation_en: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
verses.translation_zh: 除非是将入火狱的人。

verses.text: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation_en: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
verses.translation_zh: （众天神说）：我们人人都有一个指定的地位，

verses.translation_en: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
verses.translation_zh: 我们必定是排班的，

verses.translation_en: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
verses.translation_zh: 我们必定是赞颂真主的。

verses.translation_en: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,
verses.translation_zh: 他们的确常说：

verses.text: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation_en: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
verses.translation_zh: 假若我们有古人所遗留的教诲，

verses.translation_en: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."
verses.translation_zh: 那末，我们必是真主的纯洁的仆人。

verses.translation_en: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.
verses.translation_zh: 他们却不信真主，他们不久就知道了。

verses.translation_en: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
verses.translation_zh: 我对我所派遣的仆人们已有约在先了，

verses.translation_en: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
verses.translation_zh: 他们必定是被援助的，

verses.translation_en: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.
verses.translation_zh: 我的军队，必定是胜利的。

verses.translation_en: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.
verses.translation_zh: 你暂时退避他们吧！

verses.translation_en: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
verses.translation_zh: 你看着吧！他们不久就看见了。

verses.translation_en: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?
verses.translation_zh: 难道他们要求我的刑罚早日实现吗？

verses.text: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation_en: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
verses.translation_zh: 我的刑罚一旦降于他们的庭院的时候，被警告者的早晨，真恶劣呀！

verses.translation_en: And leave them for a time.
verses.translation_zh: 你暂时退避他们吧！

verses.translation_en: And see, for they are going to see.
verses.translation_zh: 你看着吧！他们不久就看见了。

verses.text: سُبْحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation_en: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
verses.translation_zh: 超绝哉你的主--尊荣的主宰！他是超乎他们的叙述的。

verses.translation_en: And peace upon the messengers.
verses.translation_zh: 祝众使者平安！

verses.translation_en: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
verses.translation_zh: 一切赞颂，全归真主--全世界的主！
